arts.ttl: Man Utd target Spurs forward Son - Sunday's gossip
arts.sum: Manchester United considering move for Son Heung-min, Kevin de Bruyne close to MLS move, Real Madrid to rival Premier League trio for Castello Lukeba, plus more.

For all players, I think it's not so much about the mood, it's about the mental state of having an opportunity now to be able to perform at the levels we want to perform, without the challenges we've had to face over the last two and a half months." Like I said during the week, we know he's playing out of position, we know we're throwing him challenges.

arts.ttl: Has Postecoglou turned corner with 're-energised' Spurs?
arts.sum: Tottenham's improvement continues with a 4-1 victory at Ipswich Town which boss Ange Postecoglou hailed as being "clinical".

arts.ttl: Angel Gomes announces huge transfer decision amid Tottenham links and summer plan
arts.sum: Angel Gomes has just made a huge decision with another of those likely to follow this summer amid transfer links to Tottenham and former club Manchester United. As the latter still has over two years remaining on his deal, it is far more likely Gomes makes the switch with a telling decision already made by the midfielder.

arts.ttl: Postecoglou press conference LIVE - Spurs boss on Johnson, Danso and Bergvall
arts.sum: Spurs suffered a couple of early scares in the game at Portman Road, with Liam Delap sending a header against the left-hand post before the visitors took the lead before the 20-minute mark when Archie Gray put Son Heung-min away down the left and his low cross was stabbed home by Brennan Johnson. A fourth goal followed after a great header on from Dane Scarlett into the path of Dejan Kulusevski who ran on, cut inside and curled an effort in off the left-hand post.

arts.ttl: Spurs player ratings vs Ipswich - Johnson clinical, Danso strong, Son shines
arts.sum: Spurs suffered a couple of early scares, with Liam Delap sending a header against the left-hand post before the visitors took the lead before the 20-minute mark when Archie Gray put Son Heung-min away down the left and his low cross was stabbed home by Brennan Johnson. Another goal followed following a great header on from Dane Scarlett into the path of Dejan Kulusevski who ran on, cut inside and curled an effort in off the left-hand post.
Ange Postecoglou has poured scorn over the notion that Tottenham Hotspur could have been relegated this season, dismissing the subject as "hysteria."

arts.ttl: Tottenham fans say one player gave his best performance in a Spurs shirt against Ipswich
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur have made it three Premier League wins in a row as they hammered Ipswich Town 4-1 on Saturday. Tottenham were eager to make...

Ange on having players back and therefore being able to bring on the likes of James Maddison, Pape Sarr, Wilson Odobert from the bench... You can see when he's got the energy and gets a chance to recover game by game that the quality is there.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou happy with progress of ‘re-energised’ Tottenham
arts.sum: Brennan Johnson struck twice in a 4-1 win at a ground where his father David Johnson had been prolific across a four-year spell for Ipswich.
